root.name: The Fall of Gods
root.description: The Fall of Gods is a classic Action-RPG. Around 10 hours long, it mixes adventure, combat, humor, side-quests, magic and riddles in a vast world called Ergia. Collect weapons, items, skills, accessories. Talk with dozens of Characters. Fight your enemies. Cast spells. Resolve hundreds of Riddles. Discover the plot between the Darkness and Gods and...of course.....Save the World!
